thread.title: FGCU player dunked so hard that he broke shot clock
thread.title_full: FGCU player dunked so hard that he broke shot clock

title: FGCU player dunked so hard that he broke shot clock
text:
FGCU player dunked so hard that he broke shot clock Dunk City is back. Post to Facebook FGCU player dunked so hard that he broke shot clock Dunk City is back.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/03/fgcu-rayjon-tucker-dunk-city-broke-a-sun-atlantic-north-florida-shot-clock   FGCU player dunked so hard that he broke shot clock Andrew Joseph 4:57   
Hey, remember Dunk City ? The No. 15 seed Florida Gulf Coast team that reached the Sweet 16 back in 2013 by dunking all over its opponents. Well, Dunk City is back. 
During Sunday's Atlantic Sun final between North Florida and FGCU, sophomore guard Rayjon Tucker soared for a thunderous two-handed dunk that was so vicious it broke the shot clock. This dunk was no joke. Dunk City shut down the shot clock pic.twitter.com/SsFYVXejLu 
The shot clock immediately stopped working after the dunk, which caused a brief delay. That clock was freaking out. When you slam it so hard that even the shot clock loses its mind @Rayjon_Tucker24 @FGCU_MBB pic.twitter.com/wLtWHzj8li â€” FGCU Dirty Birds (@FGCUDirtyBirds) March 5, 2017 
But the school got the clock working eventually. 
According to the ESPN broadcast, this year's FGCU team has dunked more than that famed 2013 Dunk City team, which is great news for fans of March Madness. 
The Eagles are looking for their second straight NCAA Tournament appearance. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/03/fgcu-rayjon-tucker-dunk-city-broke-a-sun-atlantic-north-florida-shot-clock Most Popular
